name: Bomb: A Modern Missile Command (itch)
description:
A simplified and modern take on the retro classic game: Missile Command.

Defend your city from an endless hail of falling bombs using guided missiles. Create a chain of explosions using a single missile to destroy multiple bombs. 

Your score increases exponentially the longer the explosion chain.

Simple one tap game play.

You can never win this game, only survive as long as possible, because in war, all is lost in the end.
